code: import{useParams,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Booking=()=>{const{concertId}=useParams();const[qty,setQty]=useState(1);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleBooking=async()=>{try{await axios.post("http://localhost:8002/book",{concert_id:Number(concertId),quantity:qty},{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${localStorage.getItem("token")}`}});alert("Booking berhasil");navigate("/history");}catch{alert("Booking gagal");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:40},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Pemesanan Tiket"}),"Jumlah: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:qty,onChange:e=>setQty(Number(e.target.value))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleBooking,children:"Pesan"})]});};export default Booking;
